t: New Amazon Low-Cost Store to compete with Temu - ChannelX
s: October 29, 2024 - In the Amazon Low-Cost Store, products will be listed with the brand as ‘Generic’, and there will be strict price points to ensure that they are genuine bargains.

t: Amazon takes on India rivals with low-cost fashion store | TechCrunch
s: July 12, 2024 - Amazon has quietly introduced Bazaar, a "special store" in India that features affordable and "trendy" fashion and lifestyle products.

t: Amazon Sets Rules for Its New Low-Cost Store - Marketplace Pulse
s: October 22, 2024 - Amazon’s Low-Cost Store picks the existing supply chain (China), integrates it at the source (lower fees than domestic FBA), strips away all branding (only “Generic” brand), narrows down the selection to low-priced items (per-category pricing caps, no items above $20), ships in 9-11 days ...
